docs.summary: Manage Contact list and contact details

permissions.name: Manage Contacts
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's contact info.

params.name: contactId
params.doc: Contact ID.

params.name: labelKeys
params.doc: List of label keys.

docs.summary:
Adds labels to a contact.
 The requested labels must already exist for the site.

 To find or manage labels, use these Contact Labels API endpoints:

 - To create new labels: Use
   [Find or Create Label](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/labels/find-or-create-label)
 - To find labels: Use
   [List Labels](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/labels/list-labels) or
   [Get Label](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/labels/get-label)

examples.title: Add Labels to Contact

extra.description: Labels a contact with the requested label keys

permissions.name: Manage Contacts
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's contact info.

params.name: filter
params.doc:
Filter options.
 Labels will be removed from contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria.

 See
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching)
 for a list of supported filters and fields.

params.name: search
params.doc:
Plain text search for an exact match, up to 100 characters.
 Labels will be removed from contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria.

 See
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching)
 for a list of searchable fields.

params.name: labelKeysToAdd
params.doc: List of label keys to add to the contacts.

params.name: labelKeysToRemove
params.doc: List of label keys to remove from the contacts.

docs.summary:
Adds and removes labels from multiple contacts.

 Labels will be added and removed from all contacts that meet the
 `filter` and `search` criteria.
 To perform a dry run, use the intended filter options with
 [Query Contacts](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/contacts-v4/query-contacts).

 When this endpoint is used, a bulk job is started and the job ID is returned.
 The job may not complete right away, depending on its size.
 The job's status can be retrieved with
 [Get Bulk Job](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/bulk-jobs/get-bulk-job) or
 [List Bulk Jobs](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/bulk-jobs/list-bulk-jobs).

examples.title: Bulk Add and Remove Contact Labels

extra.description: Adds and removes labels to/from contacts with first name "John".

permissions.name: Manage Contacts
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's contact info.

params.name: filter
params.doc:
Filter options.
 Contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria will be deleted.

 See
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching)
 for a list of supported filters and fields.

params.name: search
params.doc:
Plain text search for an exact match, up to 100 characters.
 Contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria will be deleted.

 See
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching)
 for a list of searchable fields.

docs.summary:
Deletes multiple contacts.

 All contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria will be deleted.
 To perform a dry run, use the intended filter options with
 [Query Contacts](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/contacts-v4/query-contacts).

 When this endpoint is used, a bulk job is started and the job ID is returned.
 The job may not complete right away, depending on its size.
 The job's status can be retrieved with
 [Get Bulk Job](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/bulk-jobs/get-bulk-job) or
 [List Bulk Jobs](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/bulk-jobs/list-bulk-jobs).

extra.description: Deletes all contacts with last name "Smith".

permissions.name: Manage Contacts
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's contact info.

params.name: filter
params.doc:
Filter options.
 Contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria will be updated.

 See
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching)
 for a list of supported filters and fields.

params.name: search
params.doc:
Plain text search for an exact match, up to 100 characters.
 Contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria will be updated.

 See
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching)
 for a list of searchable fields.

params.name: info
params.doc: Contact info.

params.name: fieldMask
params.doc:
Set of fields to update.
 Fields that aren't included in `fieldMask.paths` are ignored.
 See
 [Field Masks in Update Requests](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/field-masks-in-update-requests)
 for details on working with field masks.

docs.summary:
Updates the specified properties for multiple contacts.
 Fields that are included in fieldMask.paths are updated,
 while all other fields stay the same.

 To update a field's value,
 include the new value in `contactInfo`,
 and list the field in `fieldMask.paths` in the request.
 To remove a field's value,
 list the field in `fieldMask.paths`.

 All contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria will be updated.
 To perform a dry run, use the intended filter options with
 [Query Contacts](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/contacts-v4/query-contacts).

 When this endpoint is used, a bulk job is started and the job ID is returned.
 The job may not complete right away, depending on its size.
 The job's status can be retrieved with
 [Get Bulk Job](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/bulk-jobs/get-bulk-job) or
 [List Bulk Jobs](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/bulk-jobs/list-bulk-jobs).

extra.description: Updates last name and company for all contacts with first name "John".

permissions.name: Manage Contacts
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's contact info.

params.name: info
params.doc: Contact info.

params.name: allowDuplicates
params.doc:
Controls whether the contact will be created
 if it contains an email already used by another contact.

 If set to false, the contact won't be created.
 If set to true, the contact will be created, even if one of its emails is in use.

 Defaults to `false`.

docs.summary:
Creates a new contact.
 The request body needs to include a name, a phone, or an email.
 If all three of these parameters are missing,
 the contact won't be created.

 By default, if the creation request contains
 an email already in use by another contact,
 the new contact won't be created.
 To override this behavior, set `allowDuplicates` to `true`.

examples.title: Create Contact

extra.description:
Creates a contact with basic info,
  including a boolean indicating creation of a duplicate contact
  if one already exists

permissions.name: Manage Contacts
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's contact info.

params.name: contactId
params.doc: Contact ID.

docs.summary:
Deletes a contact,
 as long as the contact is not a site member or contributor.

 > **Note:**
 > If the contact is also a site member,
 > the member profile needs to be deleted
 > before your app can delete the contact.

docs.summary:
> **Deprecation Notice**
 >
 > **This endpoint has been replaced with
 > [Get Contact (Contacts v4)](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/contacts-v4/get-contact)
 > and will be removed on June 30, 2021. If your app uses this endpoint,
 > we recommend updating your code as soon as possible.**

 Returns a contact with the provided ID

permissions.name: Read Contacts
permissions.description: Request permission to read the site's contact info.

params.name: id
params.doc: Contact ID.

params.name: fields
params.doc:
List of projected fields to return.

 If used in the request,
 all the fields contained in `fields` and `fieldsets` are returned.
 If left blank, `fieldsets` is used to determine which fields to return.

 For a list of valid projected fields, see
 [Valid Contact Projection Fields](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/fieldsets-and-projected-fields#contacts_contacts_fieldsets-and-projected-fields_valid-contact-projection-fields).

params.name: fieldsets
params.doc:
Predefined sets of fields to return.

 Defaults to `BASIC`.
 Ignored if left empty when `fields` is used in the request.

 For more information,
 see [Contact Fieldsets](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/fieldsets-and-projected-fields#contacts_contacts_fieldsets-and-projected-fields_contact-fieldsets).

docs.summary: Retrieves a contact.

examples.title: Get Contact with `FULL` Fieldset

permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's contact info.

docs.summary:
Retrieves up to 100 bulk jobs.
 Bulk jobs are started with bulk operation endpoints in the
 [Contacts API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/contacts-v4/contact-object)

docs.summary:
> **Deprecation Notice**
 >
 > **This endpoint has been replaced with
 > [List Contacts (Contacts v4)](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/contacts-v4/list-contacts)
 > and will be removed on June 30, 2021. If your app uses this endpoint,
 > we recommend updating your code as soon as possible.**

 Returns a list of contacts, given the provided paging (offset, limit) and order (firstName, lastName, email (first email), metadata.updatedAt)

Field to sort by.

params.name: sort.order

Sort order.
 Use `ASC` for ascending order or `DESC` for descending order.

 Defaults to `ASC`.

params.name: paging.limit

params.name: paging.offset
params.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

params.name: fields
params.doc:
List of projected fields to return.

 If used in the request,
 all the fields contained in `fields` and `fieldsets` are returned.
 If left blank, `fieldsets` is used to determine which fields to return.

 For a list of valid projected fields, see
 [Valid Contact Projection Fields](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/fieldsets-and-projected-fields#contacts_contacts_fieldsets-and-projected-fields_valid-contact-projection-fields).

params.name: fieldsets
params.doc:
Predefined sets of fields to return.

 Defaults to `BASIC`.
 Ignored if left empty when `fields` is used in the request.

 For more information,
 see [Contact Fieldsets](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/fieldsets-and-projected-fields#contacts_contacts_fieldsets-and-projected-fields_contact-fieldsets).

docs.summary:
Lists facets from the sites Contact List.
 Facets are labels and subscription statuses.
 Each facet returns its details (such as `key` and `value`),
 as well as aggregated `count` of the number of contacts
 the facet applies to.

examples.title: List Facets
List Facets in Spanish

permissions.description: Request permission to read the site's contact info.

params.name: search
params.doc: Plain text search for an exact match, up to 100 characters.

params.name: query
params.doc: Query options.

docs.summary:
Retrieves up to 1,000 site contacts,
 given the provided paging, filtering, and sorting.

 To learn how to query contacts, see
 [API Query Language](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/api-query-language).
 For a detailed list of supported filters and sorting options, see
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching).

examples.title: Query Contacts by Amount Spent, Sorted by First Name
Query Contacts by Email

permissions.name: Read Contacts
permissions.description: Request permission to read the site's contact info.

params.name: paging
params.doc: Allow paginating, default: offset = 0 and limit = 1000

params.name: language
params.doc: Language for localization

params.name: filter
params.doc:
Only allowed fields:
 #info.extendedFields.emailSubscriptions.effectiveEmail ($exists)
 #info.extendedFields.emailSubscriptions.deliverabilityStatus ($eq, $ne, $in, $nin)

docs.summary:
Retrieves facets from the sites Contact List by filter.
 Facets are labels and subscription statuses.
 Each facet returns its details (such as `key` and `value`),
 as well as aggregated `count` of the number of contacts
 the facet applies to.

examples.title: Query Facets for Contacts with Effective Email

docs.summary:
Removes labels from a contact.
 The requested labels must already exist for the site.
 To create new labels, use
 [Find or Create Label](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/labels/find-or-create-label)
 (in the Contact Labels API) before running this request.

examples.title: Remove Label from Contact

permissions.name: Manage Contacts
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and modify the site's contact info.

params.name: contactId
params.doc: Contact ID.

params.name: revision
params.doc:
Revision number. When updating, include the existing `revision`
 to prevent conflicting updates.

params.name: allowDuplicates
params.doc:
Controls whether the contact will be updated
 if it contains an email already used by another contact.

 If set to false, the contact won't be updated.
 If set to true, the contact will be updated, even if one of its emails is in use.

 Defaults to `false`.

params.name: info
params.doc: Contact info.

params.name: fieldMask
params.doc:
Set of fields to update.
 Fields that aren't included in `fieldMask.paths` are ignored.
 See
 [Field Masks in Update Requests](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/field-masks-in-update-requests)
 for details on working with field masks.

docs.summary:
Updates a contact's specified properties.
 Fields that are included in `fieldMask.paths` are updated,
 while all other fields stay the same.

 To update a field's value,
 include the new value in `contactInfo`,
 and list the field in `fieldMask.paths` in the request.
 To remove a field's value,
 list the field in `fieldMask.paths`.

examples.title: Update Contact

extra.description: Updates only the given fields (`company` and `addresses`).

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Contact ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Contact ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: entityId
members.doc: ContactMerged ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: bodyAsJson
members.doc: Event body as a stringified JSON

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Contact ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: entityId
members.doc: ContactSubmitted ID associated with this event.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: bodyAsJson
members.doc: Event body as a stringified JSON

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load

members.name: offset
members.doc: number of items to skip in the current sort order

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by

members.name: hasMore
members.doc: When true, there is more data to be returned. Repeat the call, setting new offset to current offset + items to return more contacts

members.name: sort
members.doc: Allow sorting by the following fields: firstName, lastName, email (first email), metadata.updatedAt

members.name: paging
members.doc: Allow paginating, default: limit = 30 and offset = 0

members.name: width
subdivision
members.doc:
Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in
 [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/standard/72483.html) format.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street address object, with number and name in separate fields.

members.name: activityType
members.doc:
Contact's last action in the site.
 For descriptions of each value, see
 [Last Activity Types](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/last-activity-types).

members.name: revision
members.doc: Revision number. When updating, include the existing `revision` to prevent conflicting updates.

members.name: source
members.doc: Details about the app or service that created the contact.

members.name: lastActivity
members.doc: Details about the contact's last action in the site.

members.name: picture
members.doc:
Contact's profile picture.
 This can contain an image URL and a Wix Media image ID.

members.name: birthdate
members.doc:
Contact's birthdate, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
 Example: `2020-03-15` for March 15, 2020.

members.name: locale
members.doc:
Contact's locale, formatted as
 [IETF BCP 47 language tag](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5646).
 Typically, this is a lowercase two-letter language code,
 followed by a hyphen,
 followed by an uppercase two-letter country code.

 For example, German from Germany is formatted as `de-DE`,
 and U.S. English is formatted as `en-US`.

members.name: labelKeys
members.doc:
List of contact's labels.
 Labels are used to organize contacts.
 When setting the `labelKeys` property,
 only labels that already exist in the site's Contacts List can be used.
 Labels can be added and removed using the
 [Add Labels to Contact](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/contacts-v4/add-labels-to-contact) and
 [Remove Labels from Contact](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/contacts-v4/remove-labels-from-contact)
 endpoints, respectively.

 To view or manage site labels, use the
 [Labels API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/labels).

members.name: extendedFields
members.doc:
Additional custom fields.
 This includes fields managed by Wix, by third party apps, and by the site.

 Empty fields are not returned.

members.name: items
members.doc: List of up to 50 email addresses.

members.name: items
members.doc: List of up to 50 phone numbers.

members.name: items
members.doc: List of up to 50 street addresses.

members.name: items
members.doc: List of site contributor user IDs.

docs.summary:
Set of key-value pairs. Contact's extended fields,
 where each key is the field key,
 and each value is the field's value for the contact.

 To view and manage extended fields, use the
 [Extended Fields API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/extended-fields).

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type object

members.name: items
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs. Contact's extended fields,
 where each key is the field key,
 and each value is the field's value for the contact.

 To view and manage extended fields, use the
 [Extended Fields API](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/extended-fields).

members.name: email
members.doc:
Primary email address.
 This field reflects the email in `info.emails`
 where `primary` is `true`.

members.name: phone
members.doc:
Primary phone number.
 This field reflects the phone in `info.phones`
 where `primary` is `true`.

members.name: tag
members.doc:
Email type.
 `UNTAGGED` is shown as "Other" in Wix.

members.name: primary
members.doc:
Indicates whether this is the contact's primary email address.
 When changing `primary` to `true` for an email,
 the contact's other emails become `false`.

members.name: tag
members.doc:
Phone type.
 `UNTAGGED` is shown as "Other" in the Wix UI.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Phone number to be displayed in the Wix UI.

members.name: e164Phone
members.doc:
[ITU E.164-formatted](https://www.itu.int/rec/T-REC-E.164/)
 phone number.
 Automatically generated using `phone` and `countryCode`,
 as long as both of those values are valid.

members.name: primary
members.doc:
Whether this is the contact's primary phone number.
 When changing `primary` to `true` for a phone,
 the contact's other phones become `false`.

members.name: tag
members.doc:
Address type.
 `UNTAGGED` is shown as "Other" in the Wix UI.

members.name: sourceType
members.doc: App or service type that created the contact.

members.name: wixAppId
members.doc: Wix app ID, if the contact was created by a Wix app.

members.name: count
members.doc: / Number of contacts with this error.

members.name: totalItems
members.doc: Number of contacts that met the bulk job's filter criteria.

members.name: successTotal
members.doc: Number of contacts that were successfully processed.

members.name: failedTotal
members.doc: Number of contacts that couldn't be processed.

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip in the current sort order.

members.name: count
members.doc: The number of items returned in this response

members.name: total
members.doc: The total number of items that match the query

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: A flag that indicates the server failed to calculate 'total' field

members.name: fieldName
members.doc:
Field to sort by.
 For a list of sortable fields, see
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching).

members.name: order
members.doc:
Sort order.
 Use `ASC` for ascending order or `DESC` for descending order.

 Defaults to `ASC`.

members.name: filter
members.doc:
Filter object.
 For a detailed list of supported filters, see
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching).

members.name: sort
members.doc:
Sorting options.
 For a list of sortable fields, see
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching).

 Currently supports sorting on one field only.

members.name: fields
members.doc:
List of projected fields to return.

 If used in the request,
 all the fields contained in `fields` and `fieldsets` are returned.
 If left blank, `fieldsets` is used to determine which fields to return.

 For a list of valid projected fields, see
 [Valid Contact Projection Fields](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/fieldsets-and-projected-fields#contacts_contacts_fieldsets-and-projected-fields_valid-contact-projection-fields).

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc:
Predefined sets of fields to return.

 Defaults to `BASIC`.
 Ignored if left empty when `fields` is used in the request.

 For more information,
 see [Contact Fieldsets](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/fieldsets-and-projected-fields#contacts_contacts_fieldsets-and-projected-fields_contact-fieldsets).

members.name: fields
members.doc:
List of projected fields to return.

 If used in the request,
 all the fields contained in `fields` and `fieldsets` are returned.
 If left blank, `fieldsets` is used to determine which fields to return.

 For a list of valid projected fields, see
 [Valid Contact Projection Fields](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/fieldsets-and-projected-fields#contacts_contacts_fieldsets-and-projected-fields_valid-contact-projection-fields).

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc:
Predefined sets of fields to return.

 Defaults to `BASIC`.
 Ignored if left empty when `fields` is used in the request.

 For more information,
 see [Contact Fieldsets](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/fieldsets-and-projected-fields#contacts_contacts_fieldsets-and-projected-fields_contact-fieldsets).

docs.summary: will return error 403 INVALID_ARGUMENT if doesn't contain one of: name, emails, phones

members.name: allowDuplicates
members.doc:
Controls whether the contact will be created
 if it contains an email already used by another contact.

 If set to false, the contact won't be created.
 If set to true, the contact will be created, even if one of its emails is in use.

 Defaults to `false`.

members.name: revision
members.doc:
Revision number. When updating, include the existing `revision`
 to prevent conflicting updates.

members.name: allowDuplicates
members.doc:
Controls whether the contact will be updated
 if it contains an email already used by another contact.

 If set to false, the contact won't be updated.
 If set to true, the contact will be updated, even if one of its emails is in use.

 Defaults to `false`.

members.name: fieldMask
members.doc:
Set of fields to update.
 Fields that aren't included in `fieldMask.paths` are ignored.
 See
 [Field Masks in Update Requests](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/field-masks-in-update-requests)
 for details on working with field masks.

members.name: targetContactRevision
members.doc:
Target contact's revision number.
 When updating, include the existing revision number to prevent conflicting updates.

members.name: sourceContactIds
members.doc:
IDs of up to 5 contacts to merge into the target contact.
 If merging more than one source contact,
 the first source is given precedence, then the second, and so on.

members.name: sourceContactIds
members.doc:
IDs of up to 5 contacts to merge into the target contact.
 If merging more than one source contact,
 the first source is given precedence, then the second, and so on.

members.name: contact
members.doc: Preview of target contact after merging.

members.name: paging
members.doc: [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination), defaults to offset = 0 and limit = 50 (max limit 1,000).

members.name: fields
members.doc:
List of projected fields to return.

 If used in the request,
 all the fields contained in `fields` and `fieldsets` are returned.
 If left blank, `fieldsets` is used to determine which fields to return.

 For a list of valid projected fields, see
 [Valid Contact Projection Fields](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/fieldsets-and-projected-fields#contacts_contacts_fieldsets-and-projected-fields_valid-contact-projection-fields).

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc:
Predefined sets of fields to return.

 Defaults to `BASIC`.
 Ignored if left empty when `fields` is used in the request.

 For more information,
 see [Contact Fieldsets](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/fieldsets-and-projected-fields#contacts_contacts_fieldsets-and-projected-fields_contact-fieldsets).

members.name: pagingMetadata
members.doc: Details on the paged set of results returned.

members.name: search
members.doc: Plain text search for an exact match, up to 100 characters.

members.name: pagingMetadata
members.doc: Details on the paged set of results returned.

members.name: paging
members.doc: Allow paginating, default: offset = 0 and limit = 1000

members.name: pagingMetadata

members.name: paging
members.doc: Allow paginating, default: offset = 0 and limit = 1000

members.name: pagingMetadata
members.doc: Details on the paged set of results returned.

members.name: namespace
members.doc:
Scope for facet keys.
 When a facet key exists in a namespace,
 each key is unique within that namespace.

 Currently, facets not created by Wix are in the `custom` namespace.

members.name: namespaceDisplayName
members.doc: Human-readable scope name. Shown in the Wix UI.

members.name: facetKey
members.doc: Facet key, for referring to the facet in API calls.

members.name: facetDisplayName
members.doc: Human-readable name. Shown in the Wix UI.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of contacts the facet is applied to.

members.name: queryFilter
members.doc: Filter used for query contacts of this facet

members.name: filter
members.doc:
Filter options.
 Contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria will be deleted.

 See
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching)
 for a list of supported filters and fields.

members.name: search
members.doc:
Plain text search for an exact match, up to 100 characters.
 Contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria will be deleted.

 See
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching)
 for a list of searchable fields.

members.name: jobId
members.doc:
Bulk job ID.
 The job's status can be retrieved with
 [Get Bulk Job](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/bulk-jobs/get-bulk-job) or
 [List Bulk Jobs](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/bulk-jobs/list-bulk-jobs).

members.name: filter
members.doc:
Filter options.
 Contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria will be updated.

 See
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching)
 for a list of supported filters and fields.

members.name: search
members.doc:
Plain text search for an exact match, up to 100 characters.
 Contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria will be updated.

 See
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching)
 for a list of searchable fields.

members.name: fieldMask
members.doc:
Set of fields to update.
 Fields that aren't included in `fieldMask.paths` are ignored.
 See
 [Field Masks in Update Requests](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/field-masks-in-update-requests)
 for details on working with field masks.

members.name: jobId
members.doc:
Bulk job ID.
 The job's status can be retrieved with
 [Get Bulk Job](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/bulk-jobs/get-bulk-job) or
 [List Bulk Jobs](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/bulk-jobs/list-bulk-jobs).

messages.name: _com_wixpress_contacts_core_api_v4_BulkLabelAndUnlabelContactsRequest
messages.displayName: Bulk Label And Unlabel Contacts Request Object

members.name: filter
members.doc:
Filter options.
 Labels will be removed from contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria.

 See
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching)
 for a list of supported filters and fields.

members.name: search
members.doc:
Plain text search for an exact match, up to 100 characters.
 Labels will be removed from contacts that meet the `filter` and `search` criteria.

 See
 [Field Support for Filtering, Sorting, and Searching](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/sort-and-filter#contacts_contacts_sort-and-filter_field-support-for-filtering-sorting-and-searching)
 for a list of searchable fields.

members.name: labelKeysToAdd
members.doc: List of label keys to add to the contacts.

members.name: labelKeysToRemove
members.doc: List of label keys to remove from the contacts.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_contacts_core_api_v4_BulkLabelAndUnlabelContactsResponse
messages.displayName: Bulk Label And Unlabel Contacts Response Object

Bulk job ID.
 The job's status can be retrieved with

 [List Bulk Jobs](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/contacts/contacts/bulk-jobs/list-bulk-jobs).

members.name: contactId
members.doc: ID of the contact whose picture is being updated.

members.name: uploadedFileId
members.doc:
The returned file id of the image was uploaded using
 [Get Picture Upload Token](crm.contacts.contacts-v4.get-picture-upload-token).

messages.name: _com_wixpress_contacts_core_api_v4_GetPictureUploadTokenRequest
messages.displayName: Get Picture Upload Token Request Object

members.name: contactId
members.doc: ID of the contact whose picture is being updated.

members.name: fileExtension
members.doc:
File extension. Must be one of:
 `png`, `jpg`, `jpeg`.
 Defaults to `png`.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_contacts_core_api_v4_GetPictureUploadTokenResponse
messages.displayName: Get Picture Upload Token Response Object

members.name: path
members.doc:
Wix Media Platform upload path.

 Use this value in these requests:

 - [Wix Media Platform upload](https://support.wixmp.com/en/article/file-management#upload):
   Use as `path`.
 - [Update Contact Picture](crm.contacts.contacts-v4.update-contact-picture):
   Use as `uploadedPath`.

members.name: uploadUrl
members.doc: Wix Media Platform URL to send the upload POST request to.

members.name: uploadToken
members.doc:
Upload token to include in the Wix Media Platform request.

 Use this value in the
 [Wix Media Platform upload](https://support.wixmp.com/en/article/file-management#upload)
 request as `uploadToken`.

members.name: sourceContactIds
members.doc: IDs of contacts there were merged into the target contact.

members.name: passThroughData
members.doc: Pass through data, submitted with the contact

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNTAGGED
  • MAIN
  • HOME
  • WORK
  • OTHER

Possible values are:
  • UNTAGGED
  • MAIN
  • HOME
  • MOBILE
  • WORK
  • FAX
  • OTHER

Possible values are:
  • UNTAGGED
  • HOME
  • WORK
  • BILLING
  • SHIPPING
  • OTHER

Possible values are:
  • OTHER
  • IMPORT
  • APP
  • SITE_MEMBERS
  • MANUAL

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC

`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the `Value` type union. The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`. Possible values are:
  • NULL_VALUE - Null value.

Possible values are:
  • GENERAL - Last visit to your site (any unknown activity)
  • CONTACT_CREATED - This cannot be reported, used when contact created, will throw exception
  • MEMBER_LOGIN - "auth/login"
  • MEMBER_REGISTER - "auth/register"
  • MEMBER_STATUS_CHANGED - "auth/status-change"
  • FORM_SUBMITTED - "contact/contact-form", (but also "form/contact-form", "form/form")
  • INBOX_FORM_SUBMITTED - "form/lead-capture-form"
  • INBOX_PAYMENT_REQUEST_PAID - "chat/payment-request-paid"
  • INBOX_MESSAGE_TO_CUSTOMER - "messaging/email" - Direction BUSINESS_TO_CUSTOMER
  • INBOX_MESSAGE_FROM_CUSTOMER - "messaging/email" - Direction CUSTOMER_TO_BUSINESS
  • NEWSLETTER_SUBSCRIPTION_FORM_SUBMITTED - "contact/subscription-form" (but also "form/subscription-form")
  • NEWSLETTER_SUBSCRIPTION_UNSUBSCRIBE - "contact/unsubscribe"
  • ECOM_PURCHASE - "e_commerce/purchase"
  • ECOM_CART_ABANDON - "e_commerce/cart-abandon"
  • ECOM_CHECKOUT_BUYER - "e_commerce/checkout-buyer"
  • BOOKINGS_APPOINTMENT - "scheduler/appointment"
  • HOTELS_RESERVATION - "hotels/reservation"
  • HOTELS_PURCHASE - "hotels/purchase"
  • HOTELS_CONFIRMATION - "hotels/confirmation"
  • HOTELS_CANCEL - "hotels/cancel"
  • VIDEO_PURCHASE - "video/purchase"
  • VIDEO_RENT - "video/rent"
  • CASHIER_BUTTON_PURCHASE - "cashier/button_purchase"
  • ARENA_NEW_LEAD - "arena/new-lead"
  • EVENTS_RSVP - "events/rsvp"
  • INVOICE_PAY - "invoice/pay"
  • INVOICE_OVERDUE - "invoice/overdue"
  • PRICE_QUOTE_ACCEPT - "price-quote/accept"
  • PRICE_QUOTE_EXPIRE - "price-quote/expire"
  • RESTAURANTS_ORDER - "restaurants/order"
  • RESTAURANTS_RESERVATION - "restaurants/reservation"
  • SHOUTOUT_OPEN - "shoutout/open"
  • SHOUTOUT_CLICK - "shoutout/click"
  • CONTACT_MERGED

Possible values are:
  • UNTAGGED
  • MAIN
  • HOME
  • WORK

Possible values are:
  • UNTAGGED
  • MAIN
  • HOME
  • MOBILE
  • WORK
  • FAX

Possible values are:
  • UNTAGGED
  • HOME
  • WORK
  • BILLING
  • SHIPPING

Possible values are:
  • OTHER
  • ADMIN
  • WIX_APP
  • IMPORT
  • THIRD_PARTY
  • WIX_BOOKINGS
  • WIX_CHAT
  • WIX_EMAIL_MARKETING
  • WIX_EVENTS
  • WIX_FORMS
  • WIX_GROUPS
  • WIX_HOTELS
  • WIX_MARKET_PLACE
  • WIX_MUSIC
  • WIX_RESTAURANTS
  • WIX_SITE_MEMBERS
  • WIX_STORES

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_TYPE
  • DELETE
  • UPDATE
  • ADD_LABELS
  • REMOVE_LABELS
  • ADD_REMOVE_LABELS

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_STATUS
  • NEW
  • LOADING
  • RUNNING
  • COMPLETED

Possible values are:
  • BASIC - name, primaryEmail, primaryPhone
  • COMMUNICATION_DETAILS - name, phones, emails, addressses
  • EXTENDED - name, primaryInfo(email, phone), extendedFields
  • FULL - Full contact object

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC

Possible values are:
  • REGULAR - Normal contact
  • IMPLICIT - Contact that id was already allocated for it, but the contact not yet created.
  • MERGED - Contact was merged into another contact

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • ALL_CONTACTS
  • LABEL
  • SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS
  • MEMBERSHIP_STATUS
